Both graphs are shown in the x y plane. For the graph of the function f, the x axis is labeled ranges from negative 3 to 4 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 2 to 6 in increments of 1. Moving from left to right:

The curve begins at (negative 2 comma 0) and increases to (0 comma 2) in a straight line.

The curve then decreases in the next section to pass through approximately (0.6 comma 0.6) and reach (2 comma 0).

The curve then decreases in a straight line in the next section from (2 comma 0) until it ends at (4 comma negative 0.5).

For the graph of the function g, the x axis ranges from negative 3 to 4 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 2 to 6 in increments of 1. Moving from left to right:

The curve begins at (negative 1 comma negative 1) and increases to (0 comma 5) in a straight line.

The curve then decreases sharply in the next section to cross the x axis at (0.5 comma 0) and reach the point (1 comma negative 1).

The curve then decreases in a straight line in the next section from (1 comma negative 1) until it ends at (2 comma negative 2.5).

​The graphs of the functions <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> and <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> are given. Which of the following defines <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> in terms of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 5 over 2 f open parentheses 2 x close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 5 over 2 f open parentheses 1 half x close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 f open parentheses 2 x close parentheses minus 1"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 f open parentheses 1 half x close parentheses minus 1"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 f open parentheses 2 x close parentheses minus 1"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></math>
